lead_paragraph: San Jose Sharks forward Mark Bell was arrested on suspicion of drunken driving and felony hit and run after an accident over the weekend. Bell was acquired by the Sharks in a three-team trade on July 10. He received a three-year, $6.5 million contract that will pay him $2 million for the coming season.
